original_text: Is not the whole land before you? Separate yourself from me. If you take the left hand, then I will go to the right, or if you take the right hand, then I will go to the left.”
korean_text: 네 앞에 온 땅이 있지 아니하냐 나를 떠나가라 네가 좌하면 나는 우하고 네가 우하면 나는 좌하리라

sentences.original_text: Is not the whole land before you?
sentences.korean_translation: 온 땅이 당신 앞에 있지 않습니까?

sentences.original_text: If you take the left hand,
then I will go to the right.
or if you take the right hand,
then I will go to the left.”
